metadata.Title: CVE-2022-28805 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description: singlevar in lparser.c in Lua from (including) 5.4.0 up to (excluding) 5.4.4 lacks a certain luaK_exp2anyregup call, leading to a heap-based buffer over-read that might affect a system that compiles untrusted Lua code.

notes.Note: iconstantin> debian bug #1010265 mentions related code is introduced in 5.4

criterions.comment: lua50: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
